name: Block Breaker (Leigh Norton)
description:
The 3rd game in a series following tutorials to get back into game development. Although I used tutorails for the base of the game I added additional elements to make it more fun/challenging and add my own flair to it.

Controls: 

Movement - Mouse left & right 

Launch Ball - Left click 

Power ups (spawned at random when a block is destroyed): 

Faster ball - increase ball speed 

Grow paddle - increase paddle size 

Shrink paddle - decrease paddle size 

Multi-ball - spawn another ball 

Bonus points - give player 1000 extra points
